textContent:
OU Multilingual Plaza has many textbooks for each language. You can use those textbooks to teach your own language, so there is no need to prepare anything.

Don't be afraid to make mistakes! Relax and enjoy not only teaching the language, but also just having a conversation!

you don't have to prepare anything. there are many textbooks of each language. You can teach your language using those textbooks.
don't be afraid of making mistakes! Feel relaxed, and you can enjoy just talking, not only about languages!
